availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Stephen W. Geabhart (Taylor County. Mannsville postmaster)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, carpenter and postmaster. Virginia native. Married Ellen Geabhart. Farmer in Taylor County in 1850. Carpenter in Taylor County in 1860. Appointed postmaster of Mannsville, Kentucky on July 29, 1862.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, p. 85. Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, 145 rolls, Vol. 28, p. 182. Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28. Washington, D.C.: National Archives.
